articles.author: Wesley Yin-Poole
articles.title: Lords of the Fallen Global Release Time Confirmed - IGN
articles.description: CI Games has confirmed the global release times for Lords of the Fallen across PC and console.
articles.content:
CI Games has confirmed the global release times for Lords of the Fallen across PC and console.
Hexworks hotly anticipated soulslike launches October 13 on PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X and S.… [+2301 chars]

articles.author: Allison Johnson
articles.title: Here's our first official look at the OnePlus Open - The Verge
articles.description: OnePlus’ first foldable device is at least partially revealed in our first official look at the upcoming phone. It’ll be announced on October 19th at 10AM ET.
articles.content:
Heres our first official look at the OnePlus Open
Heres our first official look at the OnePlus Open
 / OnePlus first foldable is coming October 19th. And yes, theres an alert slider.
